alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 9:37PM MDT until May 05 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Kane, Sevier, Iron, Piute and Garfield Counties. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet, minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM MDT Monday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening to 4.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall back below flood stage late tomorrow morning, before rising above flood stage again early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday at Noon MDT.
